DOC.brief_summary: In patient confirmed diagnosis diabetes , eye examination comprehensive survey conduct recruitment secondary diabetes care center . All patient undergo comprehensive eye examination include wide-angle fundus photograph ocular cohaerence tomography . A questionnaire assess characteristic ( history : diabetes duration , type treatment ) , knowledge personal attitude person affect . The relevant lab finding collect electronic file . Main focus study concordance national screening recommendation ( last eye exam , presence retinopathy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Eye Screening German Secondary Diabetes Care Centers
DOC.criteria: diabetes mental handicap case blindness absence caregiver
